Set.Text: Raze Cities at double speed.[NEWLINE]Borrow City names from other in-game Civs.[NEWLINE]Provides a free [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great General with the discovering of Leadership.
After researching Calendar, you can choose a [ICON_GREAT_PERSON] Great Person with the beginning of each new Baktum.
After researching Leadership, gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each enemy unit killed.

After researching Idols, receive +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per city with an adjacent unimproved Forest.[NEWLINE]Bonus increases to +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in Cities with 3 or more adjacent unimproved Forest tiles.
Strategic Resources provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse, [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron and [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium Resources provide double quantity.
+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] science for all specialists and for all Great Person tile improvements. Receive a tech boost each time a scientific building/Wonder is built in the Korean capital.
